00029 #define           NUM_LIGHT_EFFECT_SLOTS                          25
00030 
00031 
00032 // GLOBAL FOR LIGHT LISTING
00033 LIGHTEFFECT                   gLightEffectData[ NUM_LIGHT_EFFECT_SLOTS ];
00034 UINT32                                    guiNumLightEffects = 0;
00035 
00036 
00037 INT32 GetFreeLightEffect( void );
00038 void RecountLightEffects( void );
00039 
00040 
00041 INT32 GetFreeLightEffect( void )
00042 {
00043       UINT32 uiCount;
00044 
00045       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumLightEffects; uiCount++)
00046       {
00047             if(( gLightEffectData[uiCount].fAllocated==FALSE ) )
00048                   return( (INT32)uiCount );
00049       }
00050 
00051       if( guiNumLightEffects < NUM_LIGHT_EFFECT_SLOTS )
00052             return( (INT32) guiNumLightEffects++ );
00053 
00054       return( -1 );
00055 }
00056 
00057 void RecountLightEffects( void )
00058 {
00059       INT32 uiCount;
00060 
00061       for(uiCount=guiNumLightEffects-1; (uiCount >=0) ; uiCount--)
00062       {
00063             if( ( gLightEffectData[uiCount].fAllocated ) )
00064             {
00065                   guiNumLightEffects=(UINT32)(uiCount+1);
00066                   break;
00067             }
00068       }
00069 }

00071 
00072 void UpdateLightingSprite( LIGHTEFFECT *pLight )
00073 {
00074       CHAR8 LightName[20];
00075       // Build light....
00076 
00077       sprintf( LightName, "Light%d", pLight->bRadius );
00078 
00079       // Delete old one if one exists...
00080       if( pLight->iLight!=(-1) )
00081       {
00082             LightSpriteDestroy( pLight->iLight );     
00083             pLight->iLight = -1;
00084       }
00085 
00086       // Effect light.....
00087       if( ( pLight->iLight = LightSpriteCreate( LightName, 0 ) )==(-1))
00088       {
00089             // Could not light!
00090             return;
00091       }
00092 
00093       LightSpritePower( pLight->iLight, TRUE );
00094 //    LightSpriteFake( pLight->iLight );
00095       LightSpritePosition( pLight->iLight, (INT16)( CenterX( pLight->sGridNo ) / CELL_X_SIZE ), (INT16)( CenterY( pLight->sGridNo ) / CELL_Y_SIZE ) );
00096 }

00098 
00099 INT32 NewLightEffect( INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDuration, UINT8 ubStartRadius )
00100 {           
00101       LIGHTEFFECT *pLight;
00102       INT32                   iLightIndex;
00103 
00104       if( ( iLightIndex = GetFreeLightEffect() )==(-1) )
00105             return(-1);
00106 
00107       memset( &gLightEffectData[ iLightIndex ], 0, sizeof( LIGHTEFFECT ) );
00108 
00109       pLight = &gLightEffectData[ iLightIndex ];
00110 
00111       // Set some values...
00112       pLight->sGridNo                                                   = sGridNo;
00113       pLight->iLight                                                    = -1;
00114       pLight->uiTimeOfLastUpdate                = GetWorldTotalSeconds( );
00115 
00116       pLight->ubDuration      = ubDuration;
00117       pLight->bRadius     = ubStartRadius;
00118       pLight->bAge                        = 0;
00119       pLight->fAllocated  = TRUE;
00120 
00121       UpdateLightingSprite( pLight );
00122 
00123   // Handle sight here....
00124       AllTeamsLookForAll( FALSE );
00125 
00126       //Play the breaklight sound
00127 //    PlayJA2Sample( BREAK_LIGHT_IGNITING, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( LOWVOLUME, sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );
00128 // MAdd:  for some reason this crashes the game!
00129       return( pLight->iLight );
00130 }

00134 void RemoveLightEffectFromTile( INT16 sGridNo )
00135 {
00136       LIGHTEFFECT *pLight;
00137       UINT32 cnt;
00138 
00139       // Set to unallocated....
00140   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumLightEffects; cnt++ )
00141   {
00142             pLight = &gLightEffectData[ cnt ];
00143             
00144             if ( pLight->fAllocated )
00145             {
00146                   if ( pLight->sGridNo == sGridNo )
00147                   {
00148                         pLight->fAllocated = FALSE;
00149 
00150                         // Remove light....
00151                         if( pLight->iLight != (-1) )
00152                         {
00153                               LightSpriteDestroy( pLight->iLight );     
00154                         }
00155                         break;
00156                   }
00157             }
00158       }
00159 
00160 }

00162 BOOLEAN IsLightEffectAtTile( INT16 sGridNo )
00163 {
00164       LIGHTEFFECT *pLight;
00165       UINT32 cnt;
00166 
00167       // Set to unallocated....
00168   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumLightEffects; cnt++ )
00169   {
00170             pLight = &gLightEffectData[ cnt ];
00171             
00172             if ( pLight->fAllocated )
00173             {
00174                   if ( pLight->sGridNo == sGridNo )
00175                   {
00176                         return TRUE;
00177                   }
00178             }
00179       }
00180 
00181   return FALSE;
00182 }
00183 
00184 void DecayLightEffects( UINT32 uiTime )
00185 {
00186       LIGHTEFFECT *pLight;
00187       UINT32 cnt, cnt2;
00188       BOOLEAN       fDelete = FALSE;
00189   UINT16    usNumUpdates = 1;
00190 
00191   // age all active tear gas clouds, deactivate those that are just dispersing
00192   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumLightEffects; cnt++ )
00193   {
00194             pLight = &gLightEffectData[ cnt ];
00195             
00196             fDelete = FALSE;
00197 
00198             if ( pLight->fAllocated )
00199             {
00200                   // ATE: Do this every so ofte, to acheive the effect we want...
00201                   if ( ( uiTime - pLight->uiTimeOfLastUpdate ) > 10 ) 
00202                   {
00203                         usNumUpdates = ( UINT16 ) ( ( uiTime - pLight->uiTimeOfLastUpdate ) / 10 );
00204 
00205                         pLight->uiTimeOfLastUpdate = uiTime;
00206 
00207                         for ( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < usNumUpdates; cnt2++ )
00208                         {
00209                               pLight->bAge++;
00210 
00211                               if ( pLight->ubDuration <= 0 )
00212                                     fDelete = TRUE;
00213                               // if this cloud remains effective (duration not reached)
00214                               if ( pLight->bAge < pLight->ubDuration)
00215                               {
00216                                     // calculate the new cloud radius
00217                                     // cloud expands by 1 every turn outdoors, and every other turn indoors
00218                                     if ( ( pLight->bAge % 2 ) )
00219                                     {
00220                                           pLight->bRadius--;
00221                                     }
00222 
00223                                     if ( pLight->bRadius == 0 )
00224                                     {
00225                                           // Delete...
00226                                           fDelete = TRUE;
00227                                           break;
00228                                     }
00229                                     else
00230                                     {
00231                                           UpdateLightingSprite( pLight );
00232                                     }
00233                               }
00234                               else
00235                               {
00236                                     fDelete = TRUE;
00237                                     break;
00238                               }
00239                         }
00240 
00241                         if ( fDelete )
00242                         {
00243                               pLight->fAllocated = FALSE;                     
00244 
00245                               if( pLight->iLight != (-1) )
00246                               {
00247                                     LightSpriteDestroy( pLight->iLight );     
00248                               }
00249                         }
00250 
00251                         
00252                         // Handle sight here....
00253                         AllTeamsLookForAll( FALSE );
00254                   }
00255             }
00256   }
00257 }

00306 
00307 BOOLEAN LoadLightEffectsFromLoadGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
00308 {
00309       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
00310       UINT32      uiCount;
00311 
00312       //no longer need to load Light effects.  They are now in temp files
00313       if( guiSaveGameVersion < 76 )
00314       {
00315             memset( gLightEffectData, 0, sizeof( LIGHTEFFECT ) *  NUM_LIGHT_EFFECT_SLOTS );
00316 
00317             //Load the Number of Light Effects
00318             FileRead( hFile, &guiNumLightEffects, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00319             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00320             {
00321                   return( FALSE );
00322             }
00323 
00324             //if there are lights saved.
00325             if( guiNumLightEffects != 0 )
00326             {
00327                   //loop through and apply the light effects to the map
00328                   for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumLightEffects; uiCount++)
00329                   {
00330                         //Load the Light effect Data
00331                         FileRead( hFile, &gLightEffectData[ uiCount ], sizeof( LIGHTEFFECT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00332                         if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( LIGHTEFFECT ) )
00333                         {
00334                               return( FALSE );
00335                         }
00336                   }
00337             }
00338 
00339 
00340             //loop through and apply the light effects to the map
00341             for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumLightEffects; uiCount++)
00342             {
00343                   if( gLightEffectData[uiCount].fAllocated )
00344                         UpdateLightingSprite( &( gLightEffectData[uiCount] ) );                 
00345             }
00346       }
00347 
00348       return( TRUE );
00349 }

00352 
00353 BOOLEAN SaveLightEffectsToMapTempFile( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )
00354 {
00355       UINT32      uiNumLightEffects=0;
00356       HWFILE      hFile;
00357       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
00358       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
00359       UINT32      uiCnt;
00360 
00361       //get the name of the map
00362       GetMapTempFileName( SF_LIGHTING_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00363 
00364       //delete file the file.
00365       FileDelete( zMapName );
00366 
00367       //loop through and count the number of Light effects
00368       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<guiNumLightEffects; uiCnt++)
00369       {
00370             if( gLightEffectData[ uiCnt ].fAllocated )
00371                   uiNumLightEffects++;
00372       }
00373 
00374       //if there are no Light effects
00375       if( uiNumLightEffects == 0 )
00376       {
00377             //set the fact that there are no Light effects for this sector
00378             ReSetSectorFlag( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, SF_LIGHTING_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS );
00379 
00380             return( TRUE );
00381       }
00382 
00383       //Open the file for writing
00384       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00385       if( hFile == 0 )
00386       {
00387             //Error opening map modification file
00388             return( FALSE );
00389       }
00390 
00391 
00392       //Save the Number of Light Effects
00393       FileWrite( hFile, &uiNumLightEffects, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00394       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00395       {
00396             //Close the file
00397             FileClose( hFile );
00398 
00399             return( FALSE );
00400       }
00401 
00402 
00403       //loop through and save the number of Light effects
00404       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt < guiNumLightEffects; uiCnt++)
00405       {
00406             //if the Light is active
00407             if( gLightEffectData[ uiCnt ].fAllocated )
00408             {
00409                   //Save the Light effect Data
00410                   FileWrite( hFile, &gLightEffectData[ uiCnt ], sizeof( LIGHTEFFECT ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00411                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( LIGHTEFFECT ) )
00412                   {
00413                         //Close the file
00414                         FileClose( hFile );
00415 
00416                         return( FALSE );
00417                   }
00418             }
00419       }
00420 
00421       //Close the file
00422       FileClose( hFile );
00423 
00424       SetSectorFlag( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, SF_LIGHTING_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS );
00425 
00426       return( TRUE );
00427 }

00430 
00431 BOOLEAN LoadLightEffectsFromMapTempFile( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )
00432 {
00433       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
00434       UINT32      uiCount;
00435       UINT32      uiCnt=0;
00436       HWFILE      hFile;
00437       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
00438       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
00439 
00440       GetMapTempFileName( SF_LIGHTING_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00441 
00442       //Open the file for reading, Create it if it doesnt exist
00443       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
00444       if( hFile == 0 )
00445       {
00446             //Error opening file
00447             return( FALSE );
00448       }
00449 
00450       //Clear out the old list
00451       ResetLightEffects();
00452 
00453 
00454       //Load the Number of Light Effects
00455       FileRead( hFile, &guiNumLightEffects, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00456       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00457       {
00458             FileClose( hFile );
00459             return( FALSE );
00460       }
00461 
00462       //loop through and load the list
00463       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<guiNumLightEffects;uiCnt++)
00464       {
00465             //Load the Light effect Data
00466             FileRead( hFile, &gLightEffectData[ uiCnt ], sizeof( LIGHTEFFECT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00467             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( LIGHTEFFECT ) )
00468             {
00469                   FileClose( hFile );
00470                   return( FALSE );
00471             }
00472       }
00473 
00474 
00475       //loop through and apply the light effects to the map
00476       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumLightEffects; uiCount++)
00477       {
00478             if( gLightEffectData[uiCount].fAllocated )
00479                   UpdateLightingSprite( &( gLightEffectData[uiCount] ) );                 
00480       }
00481 
00482       FileClose( hFile );
00483 
00484       return( TRUE );
00485 }

00487 
00488 void ResetLightEffects()
00489 {
00490       //Clear out the old list
00491       memset( gLightEffectData, 0, sizeof( LIGHTEFFECT ) * NUM_LIGHT_EFFECT_SLOTS );
00492       guiNumLightEffects = 0;
00493 }
